mapper.insert: insert into blogtest.user (username, password, headPortrait, nickName, email, telephone, favourite, fans, question, answer, registerTime) values (#{username},#{password},#{headPortrait},#{nickName},#{nickName},#{email},#{telephone},#{favourite},#{fans},#{question},#{answer},#{registerTime})
mapper.update: update blogtest.user set password = #{password}, headPortrait = #{headPortrait}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, telephone = #{telephone}, favourite = #{favourite}, fans = #{fans}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, registerTime = #{registerTime} where username = #{username};
mapper.select: select username, password, headPortrait, nickName, email, telephone, favourite, fans, question, answer, registerTime from blogtest.user where true
select username, password, headPortrait, nickName, email, telephone, favourite, fans, question, answer, registerTime from blogtest.user where username=#{username}
